unread_messages.subject: Phase 2.5B REDO - Target-Based Feature Correlation
unread_messages.summary: Previous 2.5B correlated features with EACH OTHER (wrong). REDO: Correlate features against PREDICTION TARGETS (LEAD of bqx_*). Pilot on EURUSD (49 targets) first.

notes: CORRECTION: Phase 2.5B must correlate features against TARGETS, not against each other. Use LEAD(bqx_X, H) for 7 BQX components × 7 horizons = 49 targets per pair.
current_task: EURUSD pilot: Correlate ALL features from ALL 6 centrics against 49 targets (7 BQX × 7 horizons)
